ai-patthana15.19:0.2_0: The Order of the Dhamma: allows unintelligent in the Khadehaka, and constantly preciously:
ai-patthana15.19:0.3_0: In the past, future, and present.
ai-patthana15.19:1.1_0: for the sake of defining the Teaching, etc., conditions don’t give rise to the cause or condition.
ai-patthana15.19:1.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana15.19:2.1_0: for one in future conditions, only with no cause or condition.
ai-patthana15.19:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana15.19:3.1_0: for the sake of present objects, conditions don’t give rise to the cause or condition.
ai-patthana15.19:3.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
